description: The download size is 748MB for me. I understand that the devs value standards compliance rather than a small binary, but I just wanted something to rip out ratings + comments, which should be just a few fseeks and freads when it comes down to it. Guess I'm just nostalgic for the time when a 64K binary could do amazing things- quite a few decent OSes were that size.
summary: solid product, 4 orders of magnitude too big tho

description: The program works well, but I really can't use it. All of my media files are on a separate harddrive. There is no option in the "store" to give it this permission. I'm sure there is a command-line adjustment that can be made, but it seems that this would be an option from within the "store" for people who are just getting started in Linux. -- Installing via "apt-get" has everything working smoothly!
summary: Needs Permissions for Accessing Removable Media in the Store Version

description: The other one in Ubuntu Store older version 19.xxx can withoutsetting any permissions. If this one v. 20.xxx has permissions settings, why not add to it ability to allow access to removable storage?
summary: Can't give permission to read from mounted volumes

description:
Please add the removable-media plug to this snap. I can't open media on my external mounted media or removable media.
Does a great job opening media stored in /home though.
summary: Can't access media on external storage

description: Momentan werden keine Infos angezeigt, Anzeigeeinstellung wird nicht gespeichert.
summary: Momentan keine Infos, Anzeigeeinstellung wird nicht gespeichert

description: Ich kann nur Dateien in meinem Homeverzeichnis anschauen, alles andere "permission denied". Für mich nutzlos, meine Daten sind auf NAS, rüberkopieren dauert mir zu lange.

La fenêtre qui doit afficher les informations est déserpérément vide.
Préférer l'autre appli qui s'appelle ausi Mediainfo et qui fonctionne parfaitement.

Выдаёт более детальную информацию по аудио и видео формату, с возможностью тут же перейти на сайт разработчика того или иного кодека. Например в обычном проводнике в свойствах файла не показывается битрейт аудиофайла, например, как 192 kb/s, а это приложение умеет. Всю ту же подробную информацию о медиафайлах можно узнавать в VLC плеере.
summary: Рекомендую, только если вы не пользуетесь VLC плеером
